data.title: Adlib Internet Server 5
data.meta_description: [eb-GB]Adlib Internet Server is a complete application to make the collections of archives, museums and libraries accessible over the internet. Adlib Internet Server is an add-on to the professional collection management applications Adlib Archive, Adlib Museum and Adlib Library.
data.text:
Scope and Content

I. FINALIST AND WINNING ENTRIES, 1982-1998

II. SCRAP BOOKS, 1956-1979

III. PRINTED MATERIAL, 1992-1994

IV. PUBLISHED MATERIAL, 1997-1999

V. PAPERS OF SIR WILLIAM AND LADY WALKLEY, 1975-1980

I. FINALIST AND WINNING ENTRIES, 1982-1988

Papers are grouped by year and listed according to judging categories. Papers may include signed entry form, statement of support of entry, article or piece of work submitted for judging, judge's appraisal form, and photograph of applicant. Papers for 1997 and 1998 only include entries of winners. Entries in the Radio, Television and All Media sections may include sound recordings or VHS video tapes which are located separately to papers. Locations numbers for sound recordings and video tapes are included in the listing.

List of finalists and winners, 1956-1998 (Call No.: MLMSS 6898/1)
